meta.title: Further School of Languages — Learning English Since 1997
meta.description: In-person and online English lessons for all ages. Cambridge and TOEFL preparation. Dynamic methodology, expert teachers, and measurable results.

fun.title: Learn English the Fun Way
fun.body: At Further School, learning English is a dynamic and engaging experience. Our classes integrate games, creative projects, and real-life situations so students can speak naturally from day one.

park.title: English School in Parque Patricios
park.body: We offer in-person lessons in Parque Patricios and live online classes. Our programs are designed for kids, teens, and adults, with small groups and personalized attention.

culture.body: We see language as part of culture. That’s why we use music, film, podcasts, and authentic materials to bring real English into the classroom.

exams.title: International Exam Preparation
exams.expertIntro: We specialize in preparation for international English certifications:
exams.toefl: TOEFL: Test of English as a Foreign Language

instagram.title: Further School
instagram.ctaBody: We bring freshness into learning by incorporating play, spontaneity, and curiosity as essential tools to unlock every student’s potential.

meta.title: Furthermore — Learn English Through Play
meta.description: Play-based learning for all ages. Take English everywhere with our FURTHERMORE game series.

intro.title: Learning English in a fun and meaningful way
intro.body: FURTHERMORE is our educational game series that blends play and learning. Created by Further Corporate teachers, it’s designed to build vocabulary, fluency, and real-life communication — at home, in school, or at work.
intro.motto: The more you play, the more you learn.

features.familyBody: Play and practice English naturally at home or on the go. Short, simple, and fun activities with useful vocabulary.
features.corporateBody: Icebreakers, team-building dynamics, and language challenges in real professional settings.
features.outdoorBody: Learn in parks, cafés, or events. Activities that connect language with real-world interaction.

ctaBar.title: Want to play and learn?
ctaBar.subtitle: Message us to bring FURTHERMORE to your school or company.

workAbroad.title: Become an English teacher and open new career horizons
workAbroad.lead: Dreaming of teaching English and traveling the world?
workAbroad.body: Our TEFL course provides the tools and techniques to teach English to non-native speakers. It includes hands-on training, modern methodology, and job opportunities within Further Corporate.

cert.title: Get certified with TEFL by Further.
cert.body1: Learn how to plan effective lessons, assess progress, and adapt materials for different levels. Upon completion, you'll be eligible to apply for teaching positions with us.
cert.body2: The course includes real classroom observations, case analysis, and strategies for integrating audiovisual and digital resources.

closing.title: Develop your teaching skills and teach English with TEFL by Further

hero.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our programs
hero.body: Can’t find what you’re looking for? Contact us and we’ll be happy to help.

items.a: We are a language consultancy with over 25 years of experience in professional training, audiovisual content, and corporate communication skills development.
We offer onsite, online, and blended classes. Each program is tailored to goals and level, using original materials and CEFR-aligned modern methodologies.
We accept corporate billing, bank transfers, and custom payment plans depending on program duration.
